MetricDescription: % of remote access points used to gain unauthorized access
Target:
X or lower, 
X % lower than previous period, 
X % reduction over a defined period 

Lower is better
Source: NIST: SP 800-55 Revision 1, Performance Measurement Guide for Information Security

MetricDescription: Average frequency of audit records review and analysis for inappropriate activity
Target:
X % or higher, 
X % higher than previous period, 
X % increase over a defined period 

Higher is better
Source: NIST: SP 800-55 Revision 1, Performance Measurement Guide for Information Security

MetricDescription: % users with access to shared accounts
Target:
X or lower, 
X % lower than previous period, 
X % reduction over a defined period 

Lower is better
Source: NIST: SP 800-55 Revision 1, Performance Measurement Guide for Information Security

MetricDescription: % system components that undergo maintenance in accordance with formal maintenance schedules
Target:
X % or higher, 
X % higher than previous period, 
X % increase over a defined period 

Higher is better
Source: NIST: SP 800-55 Revision 1, Performance Measurement Guide for Information Security

MetricDescription: % media that passes sanitization procedures testing for FIPS 199 high-impact systems
Target:
X % or higher, 
X % higher than previous period, 
X % increase over a defined period 

Higher is better
Source: NIST: SP 800-55 Revision 1, Performance Measurement Guide for Information Security

MetricDescription: % vulnerabilities remediated within organization-specified time frames
Target:
X % or higher, 
X % higher than previous period, 
X % increase over a defined period 

Higher is better
Source: NIST: SP 800-55 Revision 1, Performance Measurement Guide for Information Security

MetricDescription: % mobile computers and devices that perform all cryptographic operations using FIPS 140-2 validated cryptographic modules operating in approved modes of operation
Target:
X % or higher, 
X % higher than previous period, 
X % increase over a defined period 

Higher is better
Source: NIST: SP 800-55 Revision 1, Performance Measurement Guide for Information Security
